channel.title: An error
channel.description:
Starting BattleScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "4 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:10255) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19595) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13476) at client.process(client.java:13446) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)
Every know and then this comes up while running server(not right away) and will disconnect everyone. It seems like a random thing every 10 minutes or so and I can't seem to fix it. Does anyy one know whats wrong?
